Articles.Content:
Hello everyone.

I just started playing again after a few months and majority of my mods seem to be outdated.
Please recommend me some good mods for realistic gameplay.
Thanks in advance!

Realistic gameplay? ---> Realism Overhaul. Comes with a bunch of required dependency mods, as well as a handy list of recommended mods that go well with it. You should pick up at least Real Solar System from those recommendations, it's kind of crucial to the whole realism thing.

For anything else, you'll have to be more specific.
